body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #19716 (build: Qt 5.15.x by fanquake)
* #19683 (depends: Pin clang search paths for darwin host by dongcarl)
* #17920 (guix: Build support for macOS by dongcarl)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Updated fad898c3a00ab9108710465752033a2d6b4ec90a -> 597445cec0a31465fd0ac8cb821442ed4f8f556d ([pr18298.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr18298.01) -> [pr18298.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr18298.02), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr18298.01..pr18298.02)):

- rebased on top of #18361
- OP updated

Rebased 597445cec0a31465fd0ac8cb821442ed4f8f556d -> 49ab29464027a3f12f59e5e3c186741a9ddfa5ed ([pr18298.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr18298.02) -> [pr18298.03](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr18298.03)) due to the conflict with #18297.
Tested 49ab29464027a3f12f59e5e3c186741a9ddfa5ed on macOS 10.15.5; works like a charm.

It also works on macOS Big Sur 11.0 beta (after rebase).

cc @fanquake @theuni
@fanquake Mind reviewing this PR insofar as it fixes #16391 submitted by you :)

Hmm, it works for macOS, but is broken for Windows.

Marked as draft for now.

UPDATE: see #19772

Reasons of build fail for Windows are unrelated to this PR:
```
$ make -C depends HOST=x86_64-w64-mingw32 DEBUG=1 NO_QT=1
$ ./autogen.sh
$ CONFIG_SITE=$PWD/depends/x86_64-w64-mingw32/share/config.site ./configure
$ make
...
```
